_source.text: Actually, the situation is worse than Paul describes, at least with some of the clients I deal with at the moment: we have got to the point now where not only is it understood that if you don't sign away publishing you won't get the job, also the fees for composition and production are reduced, sometimes to zero!, with the argument that "the composer will earn enough royalties"!

text: Actually, the situation **is** **worse** **than** Paul describes, at least with some of the clients I deal with
at the moment: we have got to the point now where not only is it understood that if you **don't** sign
**away** publishing you won't get the job, also the fees for composition and production are reduced
, sometimes to **zero**!, with the argument that "the composer will earn enough royalties"!
